properties.areaDesc: Pamlico and Pungo Rivers; Neuse and Bay Rivers
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 7 at 4:01AM EST until January 8 at 2:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
...QUICK MOVING STORM SYSTEM TO BRING GALES TO COASTAL WATERS
THIS AFTERNOON AND TONIGHT...

.Winds will increase quickly late this morning and afternoon with
Gale Force conditions expected by mid afternoon. SW winds around
25 to 35 knots are expected, with higher gusts ahead of the cold
front, and then will turn to the west-northwest behind the front
early Tuesday night. Seas will build to as high as 6 to 9 feet by
late this evening. Conditions gradually improve Wednesday.

* WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt,
becoming west this evening, and choppy waters expected.

* WHERE...Pamlico, Pungo, Neuse, and Bay Rivers.

* WHEN...From 5 PM Tuesday to 2 AM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 2 AM EST WEDNESDAY
